mapper.select:
SELECT p.paidAt AS paymentDate, m.name AS memberName, m.phone, prod.name AS productName, prod.type AS productType, p.amount, p.method, COALESCE(ms.startDate, pp.startDate) AS startDate, COALESCE(ms.endDate, pp.endDate) AS endDate FROM payment p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId LEFT JOIN product prod ON p.productId = prod.productId LEFT JOIN membership ms ON ms.paymentId = p.paymentId LEFT JOIN pt_package pp ON pp.paymentId = p.paymentId
m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY p.paidAt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment (memberId, productId, amount, method, paidAt) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{amount}, #{method}, #{paidAt})
